long_description: The Edelrid Caddy rope bag keeps your trips to and from the climbing crag simple and tangle free. Flexible cylinder in the middle of the tarp keeps your climbing rope contained to prevent knots and tangles. 57 x 57 in. tarp provides plenty of space to lay your rope out without it getting dirty; a tie-in point at each corner of the tarp helps you keep track of the rope ends. At the end of the day, simply lift the tarp at the 4 corners and the rope will slide straight back into the cylinder. Edelrid Caddy rope bag is equipped with a padded shoulder strap. Sized to fit all ropes up to 80m in length.
short_description: The Edelrid Caddy rope bag keeps your trips to and from the climbing crag simple and tangle free.
